usefulItems: long sharp knife, baking paper, bowl, air-tight container, refrigerator
title: Energy bars with cereals and dried fruit

ingredients.content: 40 g dried fruit (e. g. raisins, blueberries etc.)
70 g dark chocolate, in pieces (2-3 cm)

preparations.content: Place walnuts and dried fruit into mixing bowl, chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Place into a bowl and set aside.
Place muesli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to bowl with chopped nuts and dried fruit.
Place dark chocolate into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to bowl with muesli and dried fruit.
Place almonds and 10 g water into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 min/speed 6<b> until it achieves a consistency similar to almond paste.
Add honey, and melt <b>3 min/50Â°C/speed 3<b>. Combine in the bowl with the other ingredients and mix well (see Tip).
Lay out a sheet of baking paper on the work surface, pour on the mixture and smooth out with aid of spatula to a height of approx. 1 cm. Place in refrigerator for 2 hours.
Cut into bars of the required size and serve or store in an air-tight container in the refrigerator.

hintsAndTricks: To best mix the mixture, it is advisable to wear disposable latex gloves and knead the mixture with the hands to achieve an even consistency.
